summary: Led a team of four developers working on Benefit Connect, a single-tenant B2B SaaS solution used by employers to power their employee benefits experience.
highlights: Co-led the upgrade of an employee self-service web app from ASP.NET Web Forms to ASP.NET MVC, resulting in an increased adoption rate and reduced manual processes.
Led the integration of multi-factor authentication.
Coordinated with client vendors on SSO using SAML 2.0.
Pioneered our product release consumption process.
Provided guidance to both new hires and peers through code reviews and training sessions.
